articles.author: Talia Kaplan
articles.title: US trucker convoy aims to represent all Americans impacted by COVID mandates - Fox Business
articles.description: American truckers are following Canada's lead by organizing a protest against vaccine mandates with the organizer of the U.S. group saying the American convoy aims to represent everyone impacted by the requirements.
articles.content:
The organizer of a trucker convoy in the United States dubbed the "People’s Convoy" said the group aims to represent all Americans impacted by vaccine mandates. 
"This convoy is for everyone," Brian… [+4101 chars]

articles.author: Kelly Kimball
articles.title: Review: ‘Fabulous Filipino Brothers’ explores complexity — and secret beauty — of otherness - SF Chronicle Datebook
articles.description: The directorial debut of Bay Area native Dante Basco unravels a warm, comedic and kaleidoscopic experience of being Filipino in America.
